description: Matt Andrews applies for a job at Bound & Gagged. Kyle Brandon, playing Bob Wingate, interviews him, tying him up and flogging him, throat fucking him with a dildo, paddling him and clover-clamping him, and then, when a second applicant knocks on the door, handcuffs him to the clothing rail in a closet, where Greg Foster is already bound & Gagged and waiting.
title: A Day at the Office - Applicant 1: Matt Andrews
